content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Mannheim. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Greetings Hassan, it's a pleasure to meet you. Thank you for showing interest in my apartment. Based on my calculations, I believe that a monthly rental price of 1200 Euros would be reasonable for this 25 square meter space. Of course, I am open to discussing any potential adjustments or additional terms that you may have in mind. What are your thoughts on this proposed rental price?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the price of 1200 Euros. Can I pay monthly or annually?

And what is the security deposit?
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Excellent, I'm glad we could come to an agreement on the rental price. As for payment, you have the option to pay monthly or annually. If you choose to pay annually, you will receive a discount of 10% on the total rental price.

Regarding the security deposit, I would require a deposit of 3 months' rent upfront. This deposit would be returned to you at the end of the lease term, provided that you maintain the property in good condition and fulfill all your obligations under the lease agreement.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or concerns.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I agree to the proposed rental price of 1200 Euros per month and I will pay annually with a discount of 10%. The security deposit will be 3 months' rent upfront. Thank you for your understanding, Mister Heine.

May I ask if you have any other properties available in Mannheim or nearby cities?

And what is the minimum lease term?

Please let me know.

Thank you.

Best regards,
Hassan Rahman
name: Hassan Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content:
Thank you for your prompt response, Hassan. I'm glad to hear that you agree to the rental price and terms that we have discussed.

Unfortunately, I do not have any other properties available in Mannheim or nearby cities at the moment. However, I would be happy to keep you in mind for any future opportunities that may arise.

As for the minimum lease term, I would require a minimum of 12 months. This is to ensure that both parties have a sufficient amount of time to adjust to the new living arrangements and to minimize any potential disruptions to the rental agreement.

Please let me know if you have any further questions or if there is anything else I can assist you with.

Best regards,
Heinrich Heine
name: Heinrich Heine
